pages.text: $(weapon)Beheading$() gives you a chance to collect mob heads when you defeat enemies!$(br2)Each level increases the $(important)head drop chance$(), allowing you to build an impressive trophy collection.

pages.title: Drop Chances
pages.text: $(li)Level 1: ~5% head drop chance$(li)Level 2: ~10% head drop chance$(li)Level 3+: Even higher chances!$(br2)Works on most mobs that can drop heads, including some that normally don't!

pages.title: Collectibles
pages.text: Collect heads from:$(li)Zombies, Skeletons, Creepers$(li)Wither Skeletons (easier!)$(li)Players in PvP$(li)Some modded mobs$(br2)$(o)Perfect for decoration and bragging rights!$()
